tool.name: Compute statistics
tool.command: computeStat.py #for $l in $labels: Label${l.label} #end for #for $f in $files: File${f.file} #end for $output

repeat.name: labels
repeat.title: Label for contig file
repeat.help: Names of assemblies to use in reports

param.name: genes
param.label: Genes
param.help: File with gene coordinates in the reference

param.name: threshold
param.label: Thresholds
param.help: Comma-separated list of contig length thresholds (default: 0,1000)

param.name: scaffold
param.label: Scaffolds
param.help: Are the assemblies scaffolds (yes) or contigs (no, default)

param.name: threads
param.label: Threads
param.help: Maximum number of threads (default: number of CPUs)

tool.help: This tool computes quast result from multiple contig files.
